pr_title: HHH-14234 Fix CI building error on HANA dialect

timeline.message: HHH-14234 fix CI building error on HANA dialect
HHH-14234 fix CI building error on HANA dialect

timeline.bodyText: Seems the above two dialects are not the only ones which don't treat uniqueness constraint name unique within db. Anyway, including them doesn't hurt.
timeline.author: NathanQingyangXu
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -26,10 +22,6 @@
  * @author Nathan Xu
  */
 @TestForIssue( jiraKey = "HHH-14234" )
-@SkipForDialects( {
-		@SkipForDialect( value = MySQLDialect.class, comment = "skip it for it support constraint name uniqueness in table, not db" ),
-		@SkipForDialect( value = MariaDBDialect.class, comment = "skip it for it support constraint name uniqueness in table, not db" )
-} )
